name: Sparky's Adventure: The Lost Ember
description:
Thank you for checking out the game! At the moment its future is kind of in the air and development is at a pause. Nonetheless we do hope you enjoy the game, you play as Sparky a lost ember from the final breath of a dying dragon seeking more like him. You (the player) will traverse two levels to find the flame that represents possible other "Sparkys". I hope you enjoy this.

Controls:

Left/Right = Arrow Keys

Jump = Space

Shoot fire ball = CTRL/Click

Pause = ESC
